faq.label: FAQ
faq.title: Frequently asked questions
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know about your booking.
faq.faq_setup_q: How much space and infrastructure is required?
faq.faq_setup_a: We require approx. 6×4 m of setup space, access to a power outlet (230V) and ventilation or an outdoor area for the wood-fire cooker. We are happy to clarify details in advance.
faq.faq_guests_q: For how many guests is the service suitable?
faq.faq_guests_a: Our packages are designed for 20 to 120 people. For larger events, we will create a bespoke proposal.
faq.faq_timing_a: We recommend booking at least 4–6 weeks in advance. During peak season (October–December), earlier is advisable as capacity is limited.
faq.faq_travel_a: We operate throughout German-speaking Switzerland, French-speaking Switzerland and Ticino. Travel costs outside central Switzerland are listed separately.
faq.faq_requirements_q: What does the client need to provide?
faq.faq_requirements_a: Nothing — we bring everything: cooker, ingredients, crockery, glasses and the service team. Tables and seating can optionally be coordinated by us.
faq.faq_deposit_a: After confirmed booking, we invoice a 30% deposit. The remaining balance is due 7 days before the event.
